languages.text: "Почему бы тебе не высказать это Мастеру дисциплины? У нее для таких случаев явно специальная булава припасена".
"Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."
languages.original_text: "Почему бы тебе не высказать это Мастеру дисциплины? У нее для таких случаев явно специальная булава припасена".

traits.locale_text: "Why don't you tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for cases like that."
"Why don't you tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for cases like that."
"Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such cases."
"Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such cases."
"Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."
"Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."
"Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."

languages.text: "Warum informieren wir nicht die Waffenmeisterin? Sie hat einen speziellen Hammer für solche Anlässe."
languages.original_text: "Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."

traits.locale_text: "Warum informieren wir nicht die Waffenmeisterin? Sie hat einen speziellen Hammer für solche Anlässe."

languages.text: « Pourquoi ne pas en parler à la capitaine d'armes ? Elle a une masse spéciale justement pour ce genre d'occasions. »
languages.original_text: "Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ne pas en parler à la capitaine d'armes ? Elle a une masse spéciale justement pour ce genre d'occasions. »

languages.text: «¿Por qué no se lo decimos a la maestra de armas? Tiene una maza especial para casos como este».
languages.original_text: "Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no se lo decimos a la maestra de armas? Tiene una maza especial para casos como este».

languages.text: 「どうしてマスター・アット・アームにこのことを伝えないんだ？こういう時専用の特別モールを持ってるじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."

traits.locale_text: 「どうしてマスター・アット・アームにこのことを伝えないんだ？こういう時専用の特別モールを持ってるじゃないか」

languages.text: “不如把这件事情告诉戒律大师吧？她有一把特殊的战锤，专门用来解决这种问题。”
languages.original_text: "Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."

traits.locale_text: “不如把这件事情告诉戒律大师吧？她有一把特殊的战锤，专门用来解决这种问题。”

languages.text: "Bunu neden Silahtar'a anlatmıyoruz? Sırf böyle vaziyetlerde kullanmak için özel bir tokmağı bile var."
languages.original_text: "Why not tell this to the Master-at-Arms? She has a special maul for just such occasions."
